properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:56PM EST until January 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph Saturday night.

* WHERE...Ontonagon and Gogebic Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ this evening to 1 PM EST /noon
CST/ Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will be a long duration winter storm.
Snowfall is expected to be light for most of the day Saturday
with snowfall rates around half an inch per hour or less.
Heavier snow with snowfall rates of up to one inch per hour is
expected late afternoon Saturday through early Sunday morning.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ SUNDAY
